item.title: My ‚Äúreturn of inflation‚Äù idea seems to be occurring
item.description:
Jason Furman on Twitter

‚ÄúUh oh. Some of that inflation slowdown that people (including me) were excited about might have just been a seasonal adjustment quirk. Core CPI for the last 3 months of the year goes from 3.1% to 4.3% with the new seasonal factors BLS just released according to @RiccardoTrezzi.‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/jasonfurman/status/1624093631929020416

source: Saturday assorted links

Martin Bauer on Twitter
